languages.text: "Все верно, торговка, надежда слепит — говоришь, как настоящий командир. Город ксеносов изрядно тебя встряхнул: не хочешь по возвращении покаяться и завязать с постыдным прошлым?"

"You are right, peddler: hope blinds. You sounded like a true commander just now. The xenos city must have given you a shock — have you considered repenting and breaking away from your shameful past once we are back in the Expanse?"
languages.original_text: "Все верно, торговка, надежда слепит — говоришь, как настоящий командир. Город ксеносов изрядно тебя встряхнул: не хочешь по возвращении покаяться и завязать с постыдным прошлым?"

traits.locale_text: "You are right, peddler —hope blinds. You sounded like a true commander just now. The xenos city must have given you a shock — have you considered repenting and cutting loose of your shameful past once we are back in the Expanse?"

"You are right, peddler —hope blinds. You sounded like a true commander just now. The xenos city must have given you a shock — have you considered repenting and cutting loose of your shameful past once we are back in the Expanse?"

"You are right, peddler: hope blinds. You sounded like a true commander just now. The xenos city must have given you a shock — have you considered repenting and breaking away from your shameful past once we are back in the Expanse?"

languages.text: “你说得没错，小贩，希望使人盲目。你刚刚说话的语气，就像个真正的指挥官一样，这座异形之城肯定让你反思了很多事情。等我们回到科罗努斯扩区之后，你可以选择悔改，摆脱可耻的过去。这件事情你有没有考虑过？”
languages.original_text: "You are right, peddler: hope blinds. You sounded like a true commander just now. The xenos city must have given you a shock — have you considered repenting and breaking away from your shameful past once we are back in the Expanse?"

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，小贩，希望使人盲目。你刚刚说话的语气，就像个真正的指挥官一样，这座异形之城肯定让你反思了很多事情。等我们回到科罗努斯扩区之后，你可以选择悔改，摆脱可耻的过去。这件事情你有没有考虑过？”

languages.text: «Tiene razón, buhonera: la esperanza nos ciega. Ahora mismo parece una verdadera comandante. La ciudad xenos debe de haberle causado mucha impresión. ¿Ha pensado en arrepentirse y dejar atrás su pasado cuando volvamos a la Extensión?».
languages.original_text: "You are right, peddler: hope blinds. You sounded like a true commander just now. The xenos city must have given you a shock — have you considered repenting and breaking away from your shameful past once we are back in the Expanse?"

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón, buhonera: la esperanza nos ciega. Ahora mismo parece una verdadera comandante. La ciudad xenos debe de haberle causado mucha impresión. ¿Ha pensado en arrepentirse y dejar atrás su pasado cuando volvamos a la Extensión?».

languages.text: « Vous avez raison, colporteuse. L'espoir peut aveugler. Vous vous exprimez comme une véritable commandante. Cette ville xénos doit vous avoir transformée. Une fois que nous aurons regagné les Étendues, vous pourriez peut-être envisager de vous repentir et de laisser derrière vous votre passé honteux ? »
languages.original_text: "You are right, peddler: hope blinds. You sounded like a true commander just now. The xenos city must have given you a shock — have you considered repenting and breaking away from your shameful past once we are back in the Expanse?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, colporteuse. L'espoir peut aveugler. Vous vous exprimez comme une véritable commandante. Cette ville xénos doit vous avoir transformée. Une fois que nous aurons regagné les Étendues, vous pourriez peut-être envisager de vous repentir et de laisser derrière vous votre passé honteux ? »

languages.text: 「行商人、お前の言うとおりだ─希望は人の目を曇らせる。今のお前の言葉は、まるで本物の司令官のようだったな。あの異種族の都市で衝撃を受けたのだろう…俺たちがエクスパンスに戻ったら、悔い改めて恥ずべき過去から足を洗うことを考えてみてはどうだ？」
languages.original_text: "You are right, peddler: hope blinds. You sounded like a true commander just now. The xenos city must have given you a shock — have you considered repenting and breaking away from your shameful past once we are back in the Expanse?"

traits.locale_text: 「行商人、お前の言うとおりだ─希望は人の目を曇らせる。今のお前の言葉は、まるで本物の司令官のようだったな。あの異種族の都市で衝撃を受けたのだろう…俺たちがエクスパンスに戻ったら、悔い改めて恥ずべき過去から足を洗うことを考えてみてはどうだ？」

languages.text: "Haklısın tüccar. Umut kör eder. Az önce gerçek bir komutan gibi konuştun. Zeno şehri seni şok etmiş olmalı. Enginlik'e döndüğümüzde tövbe etmeyi ve utanç verici geçmişinden kurtulmayı düşünür müsün?"
languages.original_text: "You are right, peddler: hope blinds. You sounded like a true commander just now. The xenos city must have given you a shock — have you considered repenting and breaking away from your shameful past once we are back in the Expanse?"

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın tüccar. Umut kör eder. Az önce gerçek bir komutan gibi konuştun. Zeno şehri seni şok etmiş olmalı. Enginlik'e döndüğümüzde tövbe etmeyi ve utanç verici geçmişinden kurtulmayı düşünür müsün?"

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht, Händlerin: Hoffnung macht blind. Gerade klangt Ihr wie ein echter Commander. Die Xenos-Stadt muss bei Euch einen Schock ausgelöst haben – habt Ihr erwogen, Buße zu tun und Euch von Eurer schändlichen Vergangenheit zu lösen, sobald wir zurück in der Ausdehnung sind?"
languages.original_text: "You are right, peddler: hope blinds. You sounded like a true commander just now. The xenos city must have given you a shock — have you considered repenting and breaking away from your shameful past once we are back in the Expanse?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht, Händlerin: Hoffnung macht blind. Gerade klangt Ihr wie ein echter Commander. Die Xenos-Stadt muss bei Euch einen Schock ausgelöst haben – habt Ihr erwogen, Buße zu tun und Euch von Eurer schändlichen Vergangenheit zu lösen, sobald wir zurück in der Ausdehnung sind?"
